title: Join the team for a Preseason Q&A

Would it be possible to put more option in custom games for season 5? For example: starting gold, point needed in Dominion, starting level, starting item (everyone start with Mejai's), champion ban, maximum player, stat change, respawn timer, etc. If we could save those customs games for future use, it would be awesome!
Dude, that sounds pretty sweet. I could definitely see that being pretty cool
